Summary: Triangle Formation of 5 or 6 solid lights like a dimly lit star flew from the NorthEast to the SouthWest
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hayden
There were no other sightings in Hayden on or around July 9th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding outside watching the sky when from the northeast I caught site of a formation of lights, about as bright as a dim star, I initially thought was a triangle type UFO but noticed that the lights were not in a perfect equilateral triangle and there were 4 of them. They were extremely high altitude, I'm guessing higher than a jet liner and moved smoothly without breaking formation in a straight path maybe 2 or 3 times faster than a commercial jet. The lights never broke formation and I lost them when the disappeared over the tree in my back yard. I actually jumped the fence and ran down the road to see if I could get a better view, but I lost them. I truly can not tell if these were multiple objects at a far distance or one large single craft closer up. The sky was clear with a haze on the horizon. When I first caught site of these they were almost directly over my head, I would say at about an 80 to 85 degree angle. I only saw them for maybe 5 or 6 seconds. The color was very similar to a dimly lit dull red star. There was absolutely no sound but as soon as I lost it over the trees a commercial jet came from the west flying to the east. I'm curious if the pilots saw anything. I drew a picture of their arrangement and approximate color.
